title: "View documentation guidelines"
keywords: "View documentation guidelines, model risk management, ValidMind"
---

This topic describes how to view the guidelines for model documentation associated with a template. This topic is relevant for model developers who want to make sure they are following the guidelines for a template.  

## Prerequisites

* You are a registered user on the ValidMind platform
* The model you are documenting is registered in the model inventory
* A documentation project has already been created for this project
* A model developer has started generating documentation, either using the Developer Framework or via the online UI editor
* You are logged in to the ValidMind platform


## Steps

1. In any section of the documentation, click on the "ValidMind Insights" button on the top-right corner to expand the ValidMind Insights right-hand side bar **Need image**
   - The "Documentation Guidelines" tab shows the documentation guidelines associated with this documentation template, and have been configured by the Model Validation team
   - The "Comments" tab shows the comment threads associated with this section of the model documentation

*Note: The documentation guidelines for each template can be configured by an Administrator. *
